mapper.insert: INSERT INTO capital(yr_dt, ttl_asset, capital, eqty_cptl, crnt_lblts, ttl_lblts, lqd_asset, unit) VALUES (#{yrDt}, #{ttlAsset}, #{capital}, #{eqtyCptl}, #{crntLblts}, #{ttlLblts}, #{lqdAsset}, '원') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yrDt}

INSERT INTO sales(yr_dt, consulting, sysdev_part, sm_part, sw_part, total_sales, unit) VALUES (#{yrDt}, #{consulting}, #{sysDevPart}, #{smPart}, #{swPart}, #{totalSales}, '원') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yrDt}
INSERT INTO prlss_stts(yr_dt, prft_loss, trgt_prft_loss, sales, trgt_sales, unit) VALUES (#{yrDt}, #{prftLoss}, #{trgtPrftLoss}, #{sales}, #{trgtSales}, '원') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yrDt}

INSERT INTO client_sales(yr_dt, cli_nm, cnt, suply_val, tax_amt, unit) VALUES (yr_dt = #{yrDt}, cli_nm = #{cliNm}, cnt = #{cnt}, suply_val = #{suplyVal}, tax_amt = #{taxAmt}, unit = '원') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yrDT}, cli_nm = #{cliNm}
